open.title: Vumatel installation and maintenance problems | Khayelitsha & Delft
open.description: We would like to inform you about the challenges that we are currently experiencing with installation & maintenance activities in the Khayelitsha and Delft areas, Western Cape. Due to increased violence in this area, our contractor partners are not able to freely access the area to work. All maintenance and installation activities in this area will be on hold until further notice. The safety of our contractor partners remains our priority.

updates.content: Delft will be put on hold due to hostility with local gangs. No maintenance and installations will take place. Contractors are not able to enter the area.

open.title: Frogfoot Maintenance | Western Cape
open.description: Frogfoot is conducting maintenance in Western Cape from 30 October 2025 at 04:00 to 06:00 users affected will experience limited to no connectivity during the maintenance window. We apologize for any inconvenience caused.

open.title: Metrofibre Maintenance | Rietvalleirand
open.description: Metrofibre is conducting maintenance in Rietvalleirand on the 3rd November 2025 from 23:00 to 05:00 on 4th November 2025, users affected will experience limited to no connectivity during the maintenance window. We apologize for any inconvenience caused.

open.title: Metrofibre| Eden Sandton, Edenburg
open.description: Metrofibre is conducting maintenance in Eden Sandton, Edenburg on Thursday, 16th October 2025, at 08:00 to Wednesday, 29th October 202,5, at 17:00 GMT +2 daily. Users affected will experience limited to no connectivity for a short period during the maintenance window. We apologize for any inconvenience caused.

closed.title: Metrofibre Outage | Eastern Cape Degraded
closed.description: Metrofibre has informed us of a network outage affecting the Eastern Cape, affected clients will experience limited to no connectivity. Metrofibre engineers are working on resolving this issue as soon as possible. We sincerely apologise for any inconvenience caused.

updates.content: A power outage at the Humansdorp node is causing degraded performance. Technicians are en-route with a generator.

closed.title: Vodacom Outage | Cape Town
closed.description: We are investigating reports of limited to no connectivity affecting clients on the Vodacom network in Cape Town. We are working on identifying and resolving this issue as quickly as possible. We apologize for any inconvenience that this may be causing.

closed.title: Vodacom Outage | Eastern & Western Cape
closed.description: We are investigating reports of no connectivity affecting clients on the Vodacom network in the Eastern and Western Cape. We are working on identifying and resolving this issue as quickly as possible. We apologize for any inconvenience that this may be causing.

updates.content: The service disruption has been found to be caused by faulty hardware that needs to be replaced. Vodacom has scheduled an emergency change has been scheduled for 10/23/2025 at 11:00:00 PM  till 10/24/2025 at 5:00:00 AM to restore service. We sincerely apologise for any inconvenience this may cause.

closed.title: Metrofibre| Broadacres
closed.description: Metrofibre has informed us of a network outage affecting Dakarai Lofts, Tuscany Grove. Affected clients will experience intermittent connectivity. Metrofibre engineers are working on resolving this issue as soon as possible. We sincerely apologize for any inconvenience caused.

closed.title: Vumareach Outage | Phoenix Zone 1, 2 and 3
closed.description: Vumatel is doing network migrations on the Phoenix zone 1, 2 and 3 nodes. Clients affected will experience no connectivity during the migration. ETA for migration completion is 2am on the 28th of October 2025. We apologise for the inconvenience caused.

closed.title: Afrihost NAT Outage | Northern Region
closed.description: We are investigating reports of limited to no connectivity affecting clients on the Afrihost NAT environment in the northern region. We are working on identifying and resolving this issue as quickly as possible. We apologize for any inconvenience that this may be causing.

updates.content: Service has been restored. We are currently monitoring for stability.
